My teeth have frontal gaps and are protruding in the front. I had visited Dr Amit in early 2020 to get myself treated. Back then, all I knew that metallic braces were the only method to get better looking teeth. He very patiently explained the different options in braces and a much better alternative of braces i.e aligners. He gave a comparative analysis of all options treatment and cost wise. He also showed me results of some of his patients who had opted for either of the treatments. Due to COVID, my treatment got delayed and started in October 2021. This time I decided to go with aligners. All the procedures done by him and his team before taking models for my aligners, during the treatment and post my aligners were very smooth and easy. There were absolutely zero issues during this whole course which was for 1.4 years.  Right now, I am using retainers and again the process is very well managed.

Dr Amit is a very calm, patient, cooperative individual. He takes each case vey seriously and ensures 100% results along with customer satisfaction. I was so happy with my experience that I recommended my mother to treat her root canal with him. You can definitely count Forever smiles to improve your Smile. :)
